transcript:
Customer: Mai bata dunga aapko.

(silence)

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha sir? Ha hi sir Pranjal this side from IndiaMART.
Customer: Ji sir right.
Executive: Ji sir abhi bataiye kya issue aa raha tha actually aap thoda sa.
Customer: Wo jo abhi recently kisi ne ek review kara tha one star wala ek second wo mai check kar leta hu. Actually hai na wo petroleum coke wala product tha wo product hi hat chuka hai usme se.
Executive: Abhi jo apne website pe mai check kar raha hu.
Customer: Latest review ki baat kar rahe hain aap abhi?
Executive: Ha.

Executive: Accha most recent mai abhi aapko 5 November ko ye Majiti Subbarao Eluru Andhra Pradesh se review kiya hai. Pet coke lump ke liye.
Customer: Ha abhi product hi hat chuka hai wo.
Executive: Wo actually wo wapas usko galti se review ho gaya tha to wo usko change karna chahta tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ek second aur ye mera product hai sir ye hatana hatna nahi hai ye to rehna hai udhar hi.
Executive: Matlab ye aapka product hai pet coke lump?
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: To product hai sir ye rahega to matlab unhone review kiya matlab galti se galat product liye ho gaya samjha nahi mai matlab is product pe aap nahi kar sakte na ye product ka humne sample bhej diya tha to usse galti se review ho gaya usko matlab itna idea nahi hai iska to usko re-submit karna chah raha hai but re-submit ka koi option hi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Reply kara lijiye samne se.
Executive: Reply karne ka option same pe reply kara lijiye option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Wo maine uska to kar diya but ye product jo hai na sir ye product hai hi nahi. Ye product hi show nahi ho raha hai mera.
Executive: Accha product show nahi ho raha hai ye aapka? Ek second.
Customer: Ek second sir. Ek second sir. Sir aapka d-rank me ho product add now catalog management ek minute catalog open kar raha hu.
Executive: Ye to product maine hi add kara tha ye pata nahi kaise hat gaya ye to fir wapas maine dusra create kiya agar ye same product wapas apan usko reactivate kar lenge na to I think uske number pe link chala jayega abhi uske number pe link hi nahi ja raha hai number ka option hi nahi aa raha hai uske contact ka.


Executive: Ye us din aap mere se ek product ka puch rahe the aapne ye to nahi delete kara tha ye wala?
Customer: Sir maine mai available hi nahi tha mai aaj office me available tha maine koi delete wagera kuch bhi nahi kiya aapke product ka accha accha to ye dekhiye na ye wala product kaise matlab hat gaya ye.
Executive: Mai wahi check kar raha hu ek second time dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Kar raha hu.
Executive: Kaise ab aapke all good aap mujhe bata rahe the kuch problem hai.
Customer: Ha ha bas theek hai bas theek hai.
Executive: Great.

Executive: Theek hai to abhi maine account open kiya hai aapka 70 total products active dikh rahe hain theek hai major concern apne account me last time maine aapse sath ek bar connect bhi hua tha mera jabki concerns active aapke sath active nahi the platform pe to us time mera connect bhi hua tha last month sir aapse aur maine bataya tha ki catalog score kitna important hai hamare liye kuch product ye jo petroleum pet coke hai na ye maine last time add kiya tha aapke isme ki added nahi tha.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Theek hai added nahi tha us time maine discuss kiya tha ki kuch keywords aise hote hain aasti ki kya hota hai ki jo kai bar kya hota hai jab hum by lead pe check karte hain to waha pe ek tag line show karti hai no more relevant product no more relevant by lead suggesting some that may be relevant for you matlab jis base pe aapki industry ke aur bhi competitor listed hai same industry line ki leads ko consume kar rahe hote hain to suggest karta hai to suggested by lead jab consume kar lete hain to kya hota hai ki the AI get your preference ki is tarike ki leads aapke liye relevant hai to aap product to automatically add nahi hota hai but wo ek keyword wo rank ho jata hai ki this we need to work on this on you preference based on preference consumption of lead this has been category has been created ki agar hum us category ko apne product me catalog me map kar denge as a render product then wo product map ho jayega jaise maine kiya tha but kya hua tha ki maine aapse bola tha mai sirf keyword abhi map karungi product ya description photo aur specification usko mujhe koi idea nahi tha to wo sari cheeze pending hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Okay so petroleum pet coke jo hai na petroleum coke ha ha to iska jo hai pet coke lump jo hai na pet coke lump ka mai keyword check kar leta hu available hai ya nahi.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Matlab main to sir apan ko kya hai inko karke wo hatwana hai actually to if he is ready to why not ye inka jo review hai na he is ready to re-submit and pet coke lump bhi hai mai pet coke lump ko bhi map kar de raha hu isme ek pet coke lump ko hai na ho jayega.
Customer: Mai product new product ek petroleum pet coke ho gaya aapka theek hai. Accha. Jisme petroleum coke petroleum coke ki category me deal karte hain na so pet coke bhi kehte hain. To petroleum deal karte hain aap nahi karte mai ye puch raha hu pet coke. Ha pet coke karte hain na sir hum log uska substitute banate hain hum log. Sir aisa ek kam karta hu ek bar system pe available hai ek bar meet pe le leta hu to easy rahega in short char se panch minute me sari wo nahi paunga mai aap isse hi kar lijiye abhi to on call hi kar lijiye. Okay to petroleum coke relevant hai pet coke lump relevant hai dono relevant hai na aapke liye ha ji pet coke lump ka mai

Executive: Baki aapke pass account open hai abhi?
Customer: Ek second. Account to open kar leta hu. Sir dekhiye jo catalog score jab aap open karenge na product products ka section open kariye ek bar. Okay kar diya. Yaha pe dekhiye low score 32 products dikha raha hai. Theek hai. Ji ji. Theek hai. Karta hu sir mai usko to but abhi ek bar to apan iska dekh lete hain wo wo bhi karta hu mai last time bhi I think kafi products ke change kiye the specifications to score badh gaya tha unka. Ha wahi score bahut jyada kam hai apna major abhi concern score ka hi hai. Dusra ek bar mai check kar leta hu aur koi keyword mai isme mai zarurat to nahi hai d-rank for available jispe mai workout karna. Print printed jute bag ek keyword hai jo consumption ke bihaf pe matlab product nahi added hai but keyword generate hua hai add karna hai isko? Ha kar lijiye. Printed jute bag. Ji. Sir abhi mai isko add kar de raha hu but aapko isme abhi details wagera add karni padegi. Theek hai wo mai idhar se kar dunga. Kyunki jab hoga tabhi wo product active hoga unnecessary kya honge product sirf aapka catalog score girayenge leads to aapko nahi aayenge proper iski. Hmm hmm. Nahi mai add kar dunga. Sahi hai iska ek effect bhi hota hai agar nahi add karenge proper hume printed jute bag keyword maine add kar diya ab wo upar hi inactive product active product me dikh jayega to aapko details wagera isme daliye iske baad ek aur keyword hai same on this bihaf agar nahi deal karte mujhe bata dijiyega to mai usko hatane kaise bata dunga RP granules. Re-process granules ha wo wo bhi kar dijiye. PP PP PP PP PP granules. Ha PP granules bhi kar dijiye. Okay. PP granules to waise maine already kar rakhe hain isme BOPP silver granules. Ye PP granules aapne keyword nahi dala hoga mai keyword ki baat kar raha hu. Okay theek hai sir. Usme aapne map kiya hoga par kya hoga multiple certain related keyword usme automatically primarily pick kar liya hoga usne. Theek hai okay. Theek hai. Sir pehle uska ek bar dekh lo fir aap add kar lena baad me wo koi dikkat nahi hai. Nahi actually mai kar raha hu kyuki dekhiye ispe work karna zaruri tha kyuki abhi aapne helpline number pe call kiya tha na to concern open ho gaya to account aapka tabhi concern close hoga jab sari jo cheeze hongi aapki proper hongi ye jo major hote hain highlight matlab jispe hame work karne hota hai iske bihaf pe mai aapse connect bhi karte hain. Ye bas ye last bacha hua hai uske baad mai aapko concern bhi wo aapka close kara deta hu natural PP granules. It is a different keyword ispe karte hain nahi kar wo same hi sir natural PP granules bhi rehte hain hamare pass. Natural PP to ye sare different keywords hai jo maine aapse discuss kiye na sare maine map kar diye teeno product add kar diye under this keyword aap check karoge na to ye sare aapko mil jayenge low score me. Low score me aapko usme description aur details wagera dalni hai kuch product sir out of stock bhi mark kiye aapne soft toy custom jute bags cotton carry bags nahi usko reactivate kar denge sir. Theek hai aap ek bar check kar lijiyega jo out of stock products hai jo bhi unko active karna hai theek hai aur mai aapko ek bar discuss kar leta hu marketing se ki kaise isko resolve karana hai. Theek hai. Okay. Okay sir. To customer ready hai matlab usme usko remove Yes ek bar. Accha galti se kar diya theek hai mai ek bar discuss kar leta hu kya procedure hai fir aapse connect karta hu aur ye jo concern aapka jo helpline number pe aapne call kiya tha na wo open kiya tha mai pehle usko close kar de raha hu feedback mil jayega aapko aur fir mai connect karta hu aapse kab expect karu aapki report ka? Okay. Hello? Ji sir. Mai kab tak expect karu sir aapko bas mai bas mai ja ke discuss karke hi call kar raha hu aapko mai kuch der me resolve kar dunga isko. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product 'Pet Coke Lump' is not showing.

- Wants to remove a mistakenly added review.

- Catalog score is low.

- Needs to add more keywords.



Resolution:

- Executive added 'Pet Coke Lump' keyword.

- Executive added 'Printed Jute Bag' keyword.

- Executive added 'PP Granules' keyword.

- Executive added 'Natural PP Granules' keyword.

- Executive will discuss the review removal procedure.

- Executive will close the helpline ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after discussing the procedure.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product, keywords, catalog, review, score
